actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to redetermine wheat, feed grain, and upland cotton allotments on the basis of current actual acreage planted for harvest.

summary.text: Provides for the redetermination of wheat, feed grain, and upland cotton allotments, on the basis of current actual acreages planted for harvest, for the calculation of the rate of payments to be made to farmers under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 and the Agricultural Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to redetermine wheat, feed grain, and upland cotton allotments on the basis of current actual acreage planted for harvest.
